test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity description/remark field becomes editable when gratuity amount is zero (or verify current disabled state and document the UI behavior)
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that EOS transaction can be edited (gratuity and leave encashment amounts modified) and resubmitted without generic error messages
test_cases.expected_ui_behavior: Verify EOS transaction editing and submission
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify End of Services tab is hidden for offboarded employees and visible for active employees in employee profile
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity accrual report displays column headers and labels for 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount'
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify EOS transaction form submission workflow for offboarded employees and error message display when submission fails
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that Final Settlement Amount field is visible and displays correctly on EOS calculation screen; check that UI clearly shows how deductions are applied to total
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity cap field in accrual report displays and is calculated based on Gross salary (not Basic salary only)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify column headers in gratuity file export match the data displayed in corresponding columns (e.g., 'hire date' column shows hire dates, not TL names)
Verify gratuity file download interface clearly labels month/date fields to prevent confusion between months (e.g., March vs February)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify Gratuity Report includes customizable information fields, transparent calculation logic display, and flexible filtering mechanisms
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message 'Employee does not have any salary configuration' appears only when salary configuration is actually missing, and validate form validation logic
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify Employee ID and Office columns are present in downloaded Gratuity export file
Verify gratuity liability report total calculation excludes non-numeric columns (e.g., Tenure in Years column not included in sum)
Verify Gratuity field is available in custom payroll report template dropdown and displays correctly in downloaded report
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify payroll accrual reports (Air Ticket Allowance, Gratuity Accrual, Leave Salary Accrual) are accessible for multiple closed payroll cycles, not just the most recent
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message appears when submitting EOS transaction; check error message text and visibility
Verify gratuity description text displayed in EOS form for Qatar clients; check if description references correct country labor law
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

task_flows.flow_name: Process End of Service for Single Employee
steps: Enter departure date in date picker
Add or modify deductions if needed
System calculates and displays gratuity amount
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate gratuity for an individual employee

steps: Input Computation Date for gratuity calculation
Receive gratuity file with all employees' liabilities
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate your total gratuity liability for all employees

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS form field interactions and editability
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify that EOS form fields (gratuity description, gratuity amount, leave encashment amounts) are editable in appropriate states and that form submission works without generic error messages
Verify End of Services tab visibility state changes based on employee offboarding status in employee profile

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS Report and Form UI Elements
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify EOS-related UI elements (report column labels, form fields, error messages) are properly displayed and accessible for user interaction
Verify gratuity calculation engine produces correct amounts for various scenarios (partial months, limited contracts, termination vs resignation) by comparing system output against expected values
Verify gratuity file exports display correct month labels and ensure column headers align with data content without mismatches or confusion
Verify Gratuity Report includes all required fields (gratuity cap based on Gross salary, customizable information fields, filtering options) and displays calculation logic transparently
Verify gratuity export and custom report functionality includes correct columns (Employee ID, Office), calculates totals accurately, and displays gratuity data in downloadable formats
Cannot test - all are backend calculation issues involving gratuity formula, service duration, and unpaid leave logic
Cannot test - both involve backend data synchronization and file generation logic across system modules

not_testable_tickets.summary: BE: Rename existing "Leave Encashments" labels to "Leave Encashments for End of Service"
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is 'Won't Do' - decision made not to implement, nothing to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Calculation of Leave Encashment in EOS
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is 'Cancelled' - feature request not proceeding

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't change the hiring date of the employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is 'Cancelled' - system constraint (1-year modification limit) is by design, not a bug to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't request end of service of an employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is 'Resolved' - bug already fixed, nothing to test now
Status is 'Closed' - feature request completed or closed, backend report generation cannot be tested for accuracy with Playwright
Status is 'Closed' - configuration question about leave accrual logic, backend calculation not testable
Status is 'Closed' - backend calculation dispute, cannot verify mathematical correctness of service duration calculations with Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service giving error: Something went wrong
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is 'Resolved' - bug already fixed, nothing to test now
Requires backend calculation verification for leap year adjustments; Playwright cannot validate mathematical formula correctness

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service pro rated amount isssue
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is Resolved; bug already fixed. Cannot test a resolved issue
Status is Resolved; feature request for backend reopen/reverse mechanism already implemented
Requires backend calculation verification for tenure display accuracy; Playwright cannot validate mathematical correctness against MOHRE standards
Status is Closed; requires backend calculation verification for gratuity formula correctness
Status is Cancelled; no longer valid issue to test
Requires backend calculation verification for mid-month departure and unpaid leave adjustments; Playwright cannot validate formula logic
Resolved bug - calculation discrepancy between system and manual values (AED 231,821 vs AED 252,485) is a backend calculation issue, not a UI problem to test
Resolved bug - involves backend logic for differentiating payslip vs EOS settlement letter generation; cannot verify calculation accuracy with Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: GOSI Calculated in EOS while it is already submitted
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - involves backend calculation logic tracking GOSI deductions; cannot verify double-deduction logic without backend data validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity Accrual report - calculation of closing/opening balance and new hire
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - involves backend calculation of opening/closing balances across payroll cycles; report number correctness cannot be verified with UI testing
Closed bug - involves backend recalculation logic when employee profile changes; cannot verify data consistency without database validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity amount not considering leap year days
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved bug - involves backend calculation methodology for leap year handling; cannot verify mathematical correctness of gratuity formula
Resolved bug - involves backend calculation logic alignment with 2021 UAE Labor Law; cannot verify formula correctness without backend validation
Resolved support ticket - involves backend calculation methodology discrepancy (AED 6,998.25 expected vs actual); cannot verify calculation accuracy
Resolved support ticket - involves backend calculation logic for leap year handling; cannot verify mathematical formula implementation
Backend calculation logic for prorated leave accrual during partial month offboarding; cannot verify mathematical correctness of accrual formula
Requires verification of backend gratuity calculation logic and comparison with manual calculations; cannot test calculation accuracy
Backend calculation logic for limited contract employees; cannot verify mathematical correctness of gratuity formula variations
Requires verification of historical gratuity accrual amounts and backend calculation accuracy for past closed months
Backend calculation logic differentiation between termination and resignation scenarios per UAE labor law; cannot verify calculation logic differences

not_testable_tickets.summary: Hiring date needs to be updated
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend data consistency issue - requires database verification and payroll transaction history validation

not_testable_tickets.summary: Incorrect days worked in gratuity calculation
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation bug - requires verification of mathematical formula (Basic Salary / 30) and days worked count accuracy
Backend calculation logic - requires verification of inclusive date calculation methodology and comparison with external calculators

not_testable_tickets.summary: Investigate EOS pro rated mid month pay behavior for deduction
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend payroll calculation - requires verification of pro-rated salary deduction formula for mid-month departures
Backend calculation bug - requires verification of month-counting logic and leave days formula accuracy
Feature request cancelled - no current implementation to test
Backend calculation issue - system splits SIF file generation based on arrears logic; cannot test file generation or backend splitting logic with Playwright
Data inconsistency across backend modules - requires database verification and cross-system data synchronization testing; Playwright cannot verify data accuracy across multiple system views
Documentation/help article clarification request - not a testable UI bug; resolved as documentation update

not_testable_tickets.summary: Urgent : EOS Gratuity calculation Error / Bug
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation logic issue - gratuity amount computation based on departure reason; Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of calculations
Backend calculation issue - unpaid leave days handling in gratuity formula; Playwright cannot test calculation logic or verify numerical accuracy

not_testable_tickets.summary: Wrong Total Service duration in End of Service
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation issue - service duration calculation logic with unpaid leave handling; Playwright cannot verify calculation correctness

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
